name: TI_2_1_2_7_User_Attempts_to_Access_Data__Unsuccessful___Access_Denied__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.7 User Attempts to Access Data (Unsuccessful – Access Denied) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user attempts to access data (unsuccessful – access denied).
purpose: Capture user attempts to access data (unsuccessful – access denied), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when user access is unsuccessful (denied).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.7#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
